lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: My best friend sent me a gift cert. to participate in Kiva. Now I hope to choose another person and help.
lender.occupational_info: I was married at age 23. We moved from Eastern U. S. farm community clear across to Western part of country to Montana. My husband was a geologist. We moved many times. He died 10 yrs. ago and I moved back to Ohio. I re-met a school mate and have now been married 5 yrs. I love gardening, sketching, entertaining family and friends. I especially love being a grandma!

lender.name: Romero-Rivera
lender.loan_because: We believe in helping others. And Kiva offers something that we think is the proper way to help.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: I want to encourage people around the world acheive their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a therapist in order to help peoples rise above their duality and reach the unity within that we all need to become world citizens.

lender.name: Marie
lender.loan_because: I feel that it is a good idea to help people help themselves.

lender.name: Gretchen
lender.loan_because: Someone helped me and I promised to do the same- I never dreamed that I would get to do it over and over again. Woo Hoo!

lender.name: Hans Christian
lender.loan_because: I have the privilege of being able to make a difference
lender.occupational_info: taking care of our building enheritage

lender.name: Sarah
lender.occupational_info: I defend poor people who are facing the death penalty

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I was born into a life of privilege and opportunity as a Canadian, and I'd like to pass a little of what I've received on. I am thrilled that my money can be put to work in a very tangible and personal way. I'm a mother of four with a fifth on the way, and I particularly enjoying lending to other mothers who are doing what they can to support their children.

lender.name: Carmel-Greg
lender.loan_because: helping people help themselves is the best investment anyone can make in the future.
lender.occupational_info: Managing information technology (computer development) projects from inception through installation.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: Helping individuals achieve their goals, self improve and to provide goods and services in their communities is important and benefits all of society. I trust the borrowers will in turn help others when they are able.

lender.name: Yuki
lender.loan_because: it feels good.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an firm that manages money for big corporations. My job is investor relations so I deal with everything from client servicing, asset raising and marketing.

lender.name: Karin
lender.loan_because: I want to make a positive difference in the world.

lender.name: John Richard
lender.loan_because: I think this is a very good way to help people on their way to a better life.

lender.name: WilliamsFamily
lender.loan_because:
“Charity, or love, is the greatest principle in existence. If we can lend a helping hand to the oppressed, if we can aid those who are despondent and in sorrow, if we can uplift and ameliorate the condition of mankind, it is our mission to do it, it is an essential part of our religion to do it.” (Joseph F. Smith, Conference Report, Apr. 1917).
"The more we serve our fellowmen in appropriate ways, the more substance there is to our souls.” (The Teachings of Spencer W. Kimball, ed. Edward L. Kimball [1982], 254).
"We cannot all do great things, but we can do small things with great love." (Mother Teresa of Calcutta)

lender.name: Faith
lender.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur. I believe that this is the best way for me to support another entrepreneur in their building of a business.
lender.occupational_info: I am in the health and wellness business. My passion is in educating others (and families) on how to get and stay healthy.

lender.name: Matt & Kristin
lender.loan_because: by global (http://www.globalrichlist.com) and biblical (Luke 12:16-21) standards, we have more than we really need.

lender.name: Cardie
lender.loan_because: To support women entrepreneurs and to allow them freedom to have their preferred work, they in turn will help others. Get out or into the mud, - you decide is the key!
lender.occupational_info: importer and manufacturer of home dec textiles, primarily kitchen

lender.name: Clint & Janene
lender.loan_because: We are blessed to live in Canada, and it feels nice to know we can serve our fellow brothers and sisters... One world, One family!!
lender.occupational_info: We work in the film Industry, we are stunt performers and we keep the actors safe by doing the dangerous stuff for them.. It is allot of fun.

lender.name: familytoe316
lender.loan_because: it makes a difference for the 'least of these'.
lender.occupational_info: leading people to accomplish daily transactions

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I feel that work is worship, and "blessed and happy is he that ariseth to promote the best interests of the peoples and kindred of the earth." Baha'u'llah
lender.occupational_info: I'm a field engineer maintaining medical x-ray machines that are used to help doctors see into the human body and repair things from broken bones to brain aneurisms. I also love to hike, bike, kayak, work in my little garden, and play guitar.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of human spirit to overcome any obstacle in life. From time to time, we can all use a little help along the way.

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: It's the gift that keeps on giving - I LOVE IT

lender.name: Alice
lender.loan_because: Who has not needed a helping hand?

lender.name: Ginger
lender.loan_because: every little effort makes a difference. When you give, everyone benefits from it at the end. Kiva...love the concept!
lender.occupational_info: Before becoming a homemaker my career was in Pharmaceutical Sales. To put in simple terms, I sold prescription drugs to medical professionals so they would prescribe them to help appropriate patient types.

lender.name: Pam
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: property manaer

lender.name: Anna Lisa
lender.loan_because: Jesus showed us how to care for and help the poor and sick. There are a lot of people in the world who are willing to work if they just had a little help.
lender.occupational_info: I buy and resell antiques

lender.name: Lloyd & Bonnie
lender.loan_because: everything must change.

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: I want to help others.

lender.name: Donovan
lender.loan_because: I want to help the world and make it a better place. By lending money to those in need, it makes me feel like I am helping in my own way.
lender.occupational_info: I am an 12 year old boy. I was referred to KIVA by a friend and was given a gift certificate to start with. I like to play soccer and my favorite subject is spelling.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: sometimes people need a little help to achieve big things.
lender.occupational_info: Protect a company's computer network from "bad people"

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of helping a real individual, of empowering someone to take care of themselves.

lender.name: Mike Zhu
lender.loan_because: Helping Every One to Live a HEALTHY LIFE
lender.occupational_info: LIVING each day with HEALTH, LOVE, WISDOM, DIGNITY, COMPASSION.

lender.name: Patty
lender.loan_because: I like to give these hard working people a chance to be successful

lender.name: Elana
lender.loan_because: I want to assist women to get a start
lender.occupational_info: design websites for small busines

lender.name: Victoria
lender.loan_because: I have been SO lucky: born into a rich and powerful country, never felt hungry, always have good doctors, go to the market or restaurant when I feel like it, or on a vacation when I want to. The awareness that I'm part of a practically-miniscule percentage of people who have these advantages in the world is why I keep coming back to Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I interview writers and artists for the radio and publications.

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: I want to help others achieve their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I teach, write, and consult to educators and managers.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: To help another person
lender.occupational_info: I help people find homes

lender.name: Carey and Mike Madding
lender.loan_because: Jesus told us to help others--and love them as we love Him.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: Economic development is the key for worldwide harmony.
lender.occupational_info: I help airlines fix their jet airplanes.

lender.name: Christine
lender.occupation: I help people take care of their teeth.
lender.loan_because: I believe that becoming economically independent is a long term solution for anyone and that these entrepreneurs just need that extra bit (like many of us have needed in the past) to get going!

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work with high school and college students to find ways to give back to their communities through community service, advocacy, and fundraising activities.

lender.name: Rev. Scott & Sharon
lender.loan_because: To act justly and to love mercy and to walk humbly with OUR GOD

lender.name: AmyMac
lender.loan_because: if I could visit each person in need and lend a helping hand in anyway, I would. I guess this is the next best thing.
lender.occupational_info: I am currenty home with my young children, but plan to go back to teaching within the next few years.

lender.name: Lauren A. Peña
lender.loan_because: We are called to love our neighbors as ourselves, and our global neighborhood is far-reaching.

lender.name: Minh Han, MD
lender.loan_because:
I believe one person really can make a difference.
I like using my medical knowledge to help people from around the world, but I know I can't go everywhere and do everything. With Kiva, I can help people who I might never meet but deserve the chance to succeed in life.
I came from a very poor family myself, and when my family fled Vietnam after the war, people helped us when we needed it. Now it's my turn to help others in need. Jesus said, "To whom much is given, much is required." I feel like I have been greatly blessed, and I have an obligation to return that blessing by helping people less fortunate than I am.
I just love seeing the pictures and reading the stories of individuals from around the world who are working hard to make their lives and the lives of their loved ones better. And it's a great way to learn about different countries and improve my knowledge of geography!
lender.occupational_info:
I am a family practice doctor, working with babies to old people, caring for their mental and physical health. I work in two offices, go to the hospital, and see elderly patients in a nursing home. I also serve as the high school doctor for Howell Cheney Technical High School and am on the board of directors for ProHealth Physicians, the organization I work under.
I also do medical mission work around the world when I get the chance. See pictures on my website.
When not working (which is hardly ever) I enjoy the outdoors, gardening, environmental sustainability, saltwater reef keeping, and knitting.

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: I love the concept of helping those who desperately want to improve their and their family's lives and, in the process, to improve their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I teach courses on health care policy, mental health and public health.

lender.name: Philip
lender.loan_because: I am a small business owner, and it give me great pleasure to help other less fortunate small business owners become financially independant.
lender.occupational_info: We help other business owners use the power of the internet to find more customers, and grow their business.

lender.name: Pennie
lender.loan_because: I believe we have to help where we can, and in this case, such a small amount of money can make such a huge difference in someones life.

lender.name: Stacia
lender.loan_because: I want to help people to help themselves with dignity and pride.
lender.occupational_info: I live in Bangalore, India where I work for one of Canada's pre-eminent research hospitals on the world's largest preventative health care study.

lender.name: Cornell
lender.loan_because: Helping others Help themselves.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: If not now; when? If not me; who?
lender.occupational_info: I estimate how much commercial buildings are worth, so banks can make loans accordingly.

lender.name: Shana
lender.loan_because: I want to see people who are not fortunate as we are, but are hard workers succeed.
lender.occupational_info: Child Care

lender.name: Deb
lender.loan_because: I love to read the stories and am inspired by the entrepenurial spirit of the people who are making their small businesses thrive.
lender.occupational_info: I am now retired but I used to work in an oil refinery.

lender.name: Benjamin
lender.loan_because: I loan money to help others work to accomplish their dreams. I live a very fortunate life and decided to give some of what I have.
lender.occupational_info: I am an elementary school student in Colorado.

lender.name: Gina
lender.loan_because: My grandpa once said that people who can help, should. He was pretty wise.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place. I also want my son to learn that even something small can make a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I worked for a non-profit for 4 years, then owned my own business for 5 years and now am enjoying being able to stay at home and raise my son.

lender.name: Soroush
lender.loan_because: "The value of a man resides in what he gives and not in what he is capable of receiving." ~ Albert Einstein

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I think entrepreneurial development is important for developing nations - especially for women!
lender.occupational_info: I help insurance companies accurately price their products to be competitive in the marketplace and to earn an appropriate return for their shareholders.

lender.name: Lucy
lender.occupation: Account Manager for casual gaming company

lender.name: Alexander
lender.loan_because: This is a way that I am able to help the world and bring it together.
lender.occupational_info: I entertain and bring joy to the people I play my saxophone for.

lender.name: Gwen
lender.loan_because: an amount that, for me, equals a haircut or an evening out, can literally change someone's life. How could you not?
lender.occupational_info: I manage operations at a software security company, and I teach business and ESL classes at two local 2-year schools.

lender.name: Margaret and Jim
lender.loan_because: I want to help women improve their economic position in their country
lender.occupational_info: I am mostly at home doing house maintenance, and housework.

lender.name: Draftfcb SF Production
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of 14 people who do the production of print and interactive advertising for a major worldwide advertising agency

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Every little bit helps.
lender.occupational_info: Rehabilitate small public companies.

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: Giving is receiving
lender.occupational_info: i am here to help those in need. Help me help you.

lender.name: Julie and Chelsea
lender.loan_because: we should all help each other whenever we can
lender.occupational_info: I rent out rooms in an old historical building in Tasmania, Australia

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: if you give a man a fish, he eats for day. If you teach a man to fish, he eats for a lifetime.
lender.occupational_info: Civil Rights/ Employee rights attorney

lender.name: ricky
lender.loan_because: i loan because we are four children of my mother and wer all studying i want to help my mother and my brodthers and sister all of my brodther and my only sister is my half brodthers and sister, so their are priority of my mother and my step father where i live for, i want to prove to my self that i can prove it that i can help myself to my own way, now i have 3 children to support one is 8 , 7 and 10 month baby its so hard to buy a milk of our baby because of so expensive price of milk from like me, its so hard to me to see my my little baby with out milk that i can help him to have milk evryday.right now im partimer student and vendor to our neighborhood, i study because of the future of my kids, i was 25 years old right now. at same time working. at my age im still want to persuing my studies.
lender.occupational_info: im working as a food service

lender.name: M & F
lender.loan_because: We like to support people who fight for a better life for themselves and their family.

lender.name: Dizem
lender.loan_because: I care :o)

lender.name: Eileen
lender.loan_because: it's a small and simple way that can make a difference to someone's life, and that makes it so worthwhile.
lender.occupational_info: I am a full-time mother to two beautiful boys, and i also work part-time from home and at the office, organising behind the scenes work for a helath care organisation's training and development programs. i also craft as a hobby and sell at markets. My life is cery very full.

lender.name: Annikka
lender.loan_because: These people need the money more than I do.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: It's fun, easy, and helps improve the world.

lender.name: Danny
lender.loan_because: I believe I can make the world a better place one transaction at a time.

lender.name: Llewellyn
lender.loan_because: I know what it means to receive help from others. Now it is my turn to help.
lender.occupational_info: I work with the storage and movement of machinery parts for a company that builds manufacturing machines for other factories.

lender.name: TIM
lender.loan_because: I belive in peoples hopes and dreams
lender.occupational_info: im just like you

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because:
I like the fact I 'know' who I'm helping and hopefully this will have a domino effect within their community and make a difference.
I also like the fact that this isn't restricted by religion, or politics, just help as it was intended to be.
lender.occupational_info: I advise people on how to get the best for their business from the Internet. I also design and build websites to help them do that.

lender.name: alberto
lender.loan_because: in 15 years in my job my earning is not enough for my family.i need a capital to open my own business. A simple business but its a big changes to our lives.I am a machinist so i want my future business would be a MACHINESHOP. I also love planting vegetables and gardening too.If God permitted me to loan a money i will open my own machineshop and small farm.
lender.occupational_info: i work as a machinist for 15 years in a company. I operated a lathe, milling,drill,weilding,boring,vertical machine and banch work.I describe my work is so heavy and burden but because of my family it is my duty to work hard for them to live and have some foods in the table to share.

lender.name: Mette
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone stand up for themselves and make a living.

lender.name: Knut Arild Nilsen
lender.loan_because: helping these people starting their own business will also help their community to grow and be a better place to live.

lender.name: Doris
lender.loan_because: I like to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I am a computer science student.

lender.name: YBP
lender.loan_because: we also help young entrepreneurs in The Netherlands and we also want to stimulate people with less income. These people also need an opportunity for a better living.
lender.occupational_info: Coaching entrepreneurs and applying sustainability in our own region in small business.

lender.name: Allison
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone else in the world be successful
lender.occupational_info: Supporting people with disabilities in their residential unit in everyday living recreational, vocational and promoting independance, choice and decision making

lender.name: Monserrat
lender.loan_because: I can easily spend $25.00 at a restaurant...this is more satisfying

lender.name: Takeshi
lender.loan_because: I believe one can change his/her life if given appropriate opportunities.
lender.occupational_info: journalist working with a Japanese-language national daily, specializing development issues.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: Give a man a fish, you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish, you feed him for life......Well, this is more like giving a man a fishing pole, but It's all good :)

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: The best path to true enjoyment of the many blessings in my life is to share them..
lender.occupational_info: I'm a disc jockey at a radio station. I also write, produce and voice comedy and commercials for radio, and write network news copy.

lender.name: Rhoda
lender.loan_because: This is the true joy in life, the being used for a purpose recognized by yourself as a mighty one; the being a force of nature instead of a feverish, selfish little clod of ailments and grievances complaining that the world will not devote itself to making you happy. I am of the opinion that my life belongs to the whole community, and as long as I live it is my privilege to do for it whatever I can. I want to be thoroughly used up when I die, for the harder I work the more I live. I rejoice in life for its own sake. Life is no "brief candle" for me. It is a sort of splendid torch which I have got hold of for the moment, and I want to make it burn as brightly as possible before handing it on to future generations -George Bernard Shaw
lender.occupational_info: I make digital experiences

lender.name: Huu
lender.loan_because: why not?
lender.occupational_info: I clean up land that has been contaminated by chemicals that can harm people's health

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: It's a brilliant way to help people help themselves!
lender.occupational_info: I design and print direct mail for a nonprofit.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I feel good knowing that I can help someone, even with a small amount

lender.name: Jaime
lender.loan_because: every little bit helps and I would probably buy something frivolous with the money I can use to help someone else better their life with.
lender.occupational_info: I educate children, giving them a variety of skills they will use in the future for their careers, raising their children and on a daily basis.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I have had a good life and this is a way of passing on the good fortune.
lender.occupational_info: I travel all over the US and get to see a lot of beautiful places. It is very stressful during the winter when I have to drive through snow storms.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: "To much is given, much is required." Because my life has been so tremendously blessed, I feel that it's my responsibility to extend a helping hand to my brothers and sisters across the globe.

lender.name: Evelina
lender.loan_because: It's important to help each other. Next time it's me who needs support for my business idea :-)
lender.occupational_info: I'm a social entrepreneur with my own business, The Good Tribe. I'm about to finish my master's thesis on how to connect social entrepreneurs and business angels.

lender.name: Yashesh
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Marni
lender.loan_because: My dear friend, Gina, showed me this amazing site and presented me with my first opportunity to loan. I think this is a wonderful way to help people around the world build their business and support them in their endeavors to better their lives and their communities.

lender.name: Per Øyvind
lender.loan_because: "Give a man a fish; you have fed him for today. Teach a man to fish; and you have fed him for a lifetime"

lender.name: Jon & Janice
lender.loan_because: We like the idea of helping others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: We are business owners just like you.

lender.name: william
lender.loan_because: There is so much need in the world. An old adage states, 'we only have what we give away.' I always liked that saying, and feel it to be very true, yet simple to grasp.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a metal manufacturing factory in Indiana, United States. I will retire soon. I also have a small landscape gardening business.

lender.name: Kieran
lender.loan_because: Truthfully, because its fun!
lender.occupational_info: Help retired people connect with and contribute to the NGO sector.

lender.name: Meagan
lender.loan_because: I'm finally at a place where I am able to, and I'm conscious of how I choose to spend my disposable income.

lender.name: Sherry
lender.loan_because: I enjoy the opportunity to support someone's dreams!
lender.occupational_info: Hair Salon Owner, Hair Designer

lender.name: Audrey and Chuck
lender.loan_because: It feels great to help others succeed!

lender.name: Jeannie
lender.loan_because: Because I think it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Find people work

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: What you give freely comes back to you greater than before.

lender.name: Clare
lender.loan_because: as a Christian I believe we should strive for social justice
lender.occupational_info: I moved from England to study plant pathology at Oregon State University

lender.name: Karen
lender.occupational_info: I provide healthcare to people in pain or who are overwhelmed with stress.

lender.name: Mark & Michon
lender.loan_because: I am able. As this website demonstrates, there are so many people in the world where a small loan can make a significant difference in their lives. I feel an obligation to help.
lender.occupational_info: I invent and design advertising ideas for various clients.

lender.name: ronald
lender.loan_because: i can
lender.occupational_info: media film/tv

lender.name: Joan
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I've seen microloans at work during my time as a Peace Corps Volunteer.
lender.occupational_info: I regulate the import and export of plant propagative material for the U.S.

lender.name: M. Brian
lender.loan_because: I can & should.

lender.name: David&Mojca
lender.loan_because: We can.
lender.occupational_info: You know the Call Centers you love to hate? I help build them.

lender.name: grace
lender.loan_because: I kow how difficult it is to sustain a business.

lender.name: KAREN
lender.loan_because: I want to help people less fortunate to achieve their dream
lender.occupational_info: I work on a computer designing in 3D mechanical things such as car radios, truck bodies and now jet engines

lender.name: Katrina
lender.loan_because: In today's world no one should ever go without! I'm greatful for everything I've been blessed with. It's the least I can do to try and give back.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a restuarant to pay my way through school. People come in and I serve them food and drinks.

lender.name: Hannah
lender.loan_because: Empowering someone to make decisions and control their life is one of the valuable ways to improve the world, one person at a time.

lender.name: www.LIVEINPEACE.ws
lender.occupational_info: To encourage a stellar way to exist: to find balance, come from your heart, and share with one another ... LIVE IN PEACE

lender.name: Stefan
lender.loan_because: The support of friends and family has allowed me to take risks in life. It has given me the resources to try new things, and helped to soften the blow when my attempts met with failure. Now that many of my risks have succeeded, I want to share this support with others.
lender.occupational_info: I study the way brains work and the way people think, particularly how we form expectations and how our expectations change what we perceive and what we learn.

lender.name: Courtney Harris
lender.loan_because: my global family needs some love sent their way.
lender.occupational_info: Most of the time, I put on my nerdy glasses and study all day working towards a Master's in Fine Arts. This will enable me to teach in a university setting one day. But when I'm not studying, I teach dance (my most favorite thing in life) and choreograph.

lender.name: Yankee Fan
lender.loan_because: it shows our humanity. Microloans are a wonderful concept that allows us to lend a hand to someone we will never meet but who will remain unforgettable.

lender.name: Tara
lender.loan_because: I have recently become obsessed with the environment and the other people in the world that can't afford Webkinz and such. It makes me feel good about myself, being that my family is lucky enough to afford more than the necessities.
lender.occupational_info: I am in a pleasant school. :)

lender.name: Elise
lender.loan_because: Give a Man a fish....
lender.occupational_info: I figure out how much of something we are going to sell in a year and have that amount purchased.

lender.name: Merywen
lender.loan_because: I believe that the best way to make a difference for social justice and poverty alleviation is by getting money and opportunity into the hands of people at the grassroots level.
lender.occupational_info: I get paid to design and implement training for public health researchers in Africa and Asia. My other work, for satisfaction, is to help collect bicycles destined for America's landfills and find them new owners in less developed countries.

lender.name: Webber Academy Gr 12
lender.occupational_info: We are Grade 12 students that have formed a recycling committee in our school. We help to encourage and collect recycling throughout our school community, and use the proceeds to lend to deserving entrepreneurs around the world.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: It's something that I can do directly, to assist and enable women around the world to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I help people in organizations to be more effective in doing their work through giving them tools and understanding of how they can do it better.

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: I think this is the best idea ever. So much more personal than just writing a check. It's brilliant!
lender.occupational_info: I work in a university helping students and professors.

lender.name: Muriel
lender.loan_because: I Care.

lender.name: Martin and Ann Marie
lender.loan_because: We want to help people help themselves and their families to a better life.
lender.occupational_info: Operate self-service coin-operated laundries and volunteer in arts and educational organizations.

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to have more than I need and I feel that there are many who deserve the same chances I have been given!
lender.occupational_info: I have spent many years teaching young children about their world and how to fit into it as productive, happy and loving members.

lender.name: Alicia
lender.loan_because:
there is too much injustice in our world and I want everyone to have the opportunity to a happy, healthy life full of love.
I have the seen the power of microloans to make a difference and bring the world a little closer to equality, and I want to support my friends around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying international social policy and international development, to figure out the most appropriate way for me to help make the world a better place

lender.name: Bobbi
lender.loan_because: people must receive support in their efforts to sustain themselves and improve their lives in the ways that work best within their cultures.
lender.occupational_info: I volunteer as a leader in several organizations using my past business experience.

lender.name: Henry & William
lender.loan_because:
H: "Because I want to. It helps them buy food."
W: "Because it will help them."
lender.occupational_info:
W: "We learn phonics and math & stuff."
H: "I play harp"

lender.name: Carlos
lender.loan_because: I do unto others as I would like others do unto me. Let us make this world a better place by doing the right thing!

lender.name: Tricia
lender.loan_because: my life is blessed and I want to share that abundance with others.

lender.name: Alan
lender.loan_because: It helps and its fun!
lender.occupational_info: I manage/invest money on the behalf of my firm's clients.

lender.name: Blaine
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to.

lender.name: Nivita
lender.loan_because: with privilege comes the responsibility to help others and I believe in the beauty of dreams...

lender.name: laura
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: medical sales

lender.name: Rob
lender.occupational_info: I build software to help people communicate and collaborate on websites.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: sometimes all it takes is a little bit of help.

lender.name: Oliver&Ute
lender.loan_because: There are worse ways to spend our money :)
lender.occupational_info: Keeping money together... / Making people hear better again

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: Everybody deserves the right to live with a roof over their head, food in their stomachs, and a smile on their face. Its an inalienable human right.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me and my family and this is just one way of sharing that blessing with others.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: "Injustice ANYWHERE is a threat to justice EVERYWHERE." --- Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 6th and 7th grade students World History and Social Studies.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I care about the global community.
lender.occupational_info: I help students in the university setting.

lender.name: Maranda
lender.loan_because: I care about helping the world's ambitious population to lift itself up and improve life for everyone.
lender.occupational_info: Creating new technologies for the next generation.

lender.name: Roberto
lender.loan_because: It's a wonderful thing to be in a position to assist - thank you Kiva!!
lender.occupational_info: I design things to make them work better. Right now I am working on a business to make it work easier using computers. I am also working on an instrument that we make here.. it can be improved in many ways.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: This type of giving feels very personal to me and it is great that US$$ go further in developing countries. I hope all the loan recipients achieve their goals. Such a great idea!!!

lender.name: Mary Beth
lender.loan_because: I am so blessed, and this is a beautiful meaningful way to empower others to be self sustaining.
lender.occupational_info: I teach nurses and doctors to care for the patients in critical care

lender.name: Mika
lender.loan_because: compassion is fundamental.
lender.occupational_info: I help people become better writers.

lender.name: Nipith
lender.loan_because: The first step is always the hardest.

lender.name: Athalia
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in peoples lives & by loaning through Kiva, I will assist in making other human beings vision a reality, as well as helping them to achieve independence.
lender.occupational_info: I make men, women, & children feel handsome & beautiful through styling, cutting, & coloring their hair.

lender.name: QT Quilters Group
lender.loan_because: We want to encourage other women who support their families through tailoring and sewing. We would like to challenge other quilting groups to do the same - and tell us about it!
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of women who meet on a weekly basis to quilt. Bed quilts, baby quilts, fabric bags - you name it. We all have our strengths and we support, encourage and inspire each other.

lender.name: Maria L
lender.loan_because: It feels good :)

lender.name: Pari & Don
lender.loan_because: We enjoy helping others who are trying so hard to make their lives and those of their families better.
lender.occupational_info: We are land conservation consultants who help landowners protect and preserve their land for future generations.

lender.name: Jo-Anne
lender.loan_because: To love my neighbour.

lender.name: The Boys
lender.loan_because: If your not part of the solution.... then your part of the problem!
lender.occupational_info: Looking cute, Playing with each other, Keeping rodents away from our home...... It's a living

lender.name: Lester
lender.loan_because:
“If anyone has material possessions and sees his brother in need but has no pity on him, how can the love of God be in him?” -1 John 3:17
The parable of those who spend of their substance in the way of Allah is that of a grain of corn: It grows seven ears, and each ear has a hundred grains. Allah gives manifold increase to whom He pleases; And Allah cares for all and He knows all things. Qur'an (2:261)
Mishneh Torah, Hilkhot matanot aniyim : Giving an interest-free loan to a person in need; forming a partnership with a person in need; giving a grant to a person in need; finding a job for a person in need; so long as that loan, grant, partnership, or job results in the person no longer living by relying upon others
lender.occupational_info: Train and configure software for small physician practices.
